structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Denial of authority to create county office or position.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 64.480 to 64.740 is intended to authorize the fiscal court of any county to create any office or make any employment not authorized by law.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 11.
